content:
Sophia Lee is a ceramic artist and cookbook author based in San Francisco, California. Her passion for ceramic cookware was ignited during her time at San Francisco State University, where she earned a degree in Art and Ceramics. Through her studies, Sophia developed a deep understanding of the qualities that make ceramic cookware unique, such as its ability to distribute heat evenly and retain warmth.

Sophia's experience as a ceramic artist has cultivated her expertise in the field of ceramic cookware. She creates her own line of handcrafted ceramic cookware, which she uses and promotes in her cooking. Her commitment to sustainable and non-toxic materials is evident in her writing and her ceramic art.

In addition to her love of ceramics, Sophia enjoys exploring the Bay Area's many farmers' markets and using seasonal ingredients in her cooking. She is also an avid hiker and enjoys spending time in nature. Sophia's hobbies inspire her creativity in the kitchen and inform her cooking style, which is rooted in simplicity, sustainability, and the joy of sharing food with others.
